alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 31 at 2:24PM AKST until January 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.
